channel.title: Moparcraft is merging with Moparscape
channel.description: The Moparcraft forums are being merged back to Moparscape, you can find Moparcraft in a separate category now. The vanilla & FeedTheBeast server will be unaffected and are still running. The staff team for Moparcraft will also be unaffected.

item.title: Moparcraft is merging with Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

The Moparcraft forums are being merged back to Moparscape, you can find Moparcraft in a separate category now. The vanilla & FeedTheBeast server will be unaffected and are still running. The staff team for Moparcraft will also be unaffected.

Read full topic
